newsitem.title: USA: Bradmark Inc to expand UK operations.
newsitem.headline: Bradmark Inc to expand UK operations.

text.p: Privately-held Bradmark Inc, which develops database utility software, said on Monday it was expanding its United Kingdom operations due to an increased client base and distributor network growth.
It said it tripled its office space and named Simon Williams business development director to manage the over 50 distributors across Europe, the Middle East and Africa.
The company said it also planned to increase the entire UK staff by over 50 percent within the next year.
"This move triples our space and enables us to proactively manage our burgeoning customer and distributor base," said Gerry Leith, managing director of Bradmark UK Ltd.
